title: A Novel Approach for a Smart IoMT-Based BAN for an Old Home Healthcare Monitoring System Using Starlink
summary: The rapid evolution of the Internet of Medical Things (IoMT) technology has become a transformative force in modern healthcare, particularly in elderly patient management. The current elderly care system faces significant challenges, including insufficient long-term care resources and poor communication between healthcare providers.
